Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 103rd/Wood
ShortDescription: Westbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Vincennes, 107th, Western and 103rd due to street blockage near 103rd/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Vincennes, 107th, Western and 103rd due to street blockage near 103rd/Wood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at 51st
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at 51st due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at 51st due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
